data.title: Robbery Under Arms
data.meta_description: Robbery Under Arms by Boldrewood Rolf and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Paperback. Condition: Very Good. The book has been read, but is in excellent condition. Pages are intact and not marred by notes or highlighting. The spine remains undamaged.

Condition: Poor. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has hardback covers. In poor condition, suitable as a reading copy. No dust jacket. No date; Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,550grams, ISBN:

Condition: Good. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has hardback covers. In good all round condition. Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,500grams, ISBN:

Paperback. Condition: Good. The book has been read but remains in clean condition. All pages are intact and the cover is intact. Some minor wear to the spine.

Condition: Good. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has hardback covers. In good all round condition. No dust jacket. Undated. Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,495grams, ISBN:

Condition: Fair. 1955. Reprinted. 660 pages. No dust jacket. Blue cloth. Pages are lightly tanned and foxed throughout, heavier to endpapers. Occasional thumb-marking present. Cracking to hinges with exposed binding, causing boards to be slightly loose. Dark rubbing to text-block edges. Binding is slightly shaky. Boards have moderate edge wear with bumping to corners and rubbing to surfaces. Crushing to spine ends with small splits and fraying to cloth. Scuffing and light marking overall. Notable tanning to spine and edges. Splits to joints. Book is slightly forward leaning.

Condition: Good. Most items will be dispatched the same or the next working day. A good condition book. A reprint with plain red boards and a nice dust jacket within protective plastic. Foxing to the textblock edges. Internal contents appear clear and well-bound.

Condition: Good. 1951. Third Australian Edition. 427 pages. No dust jacket. Green cloth board with lettering. Contains black and white illustrations. Schola Grammatica Sydneiensis gilt sign on front board. Prize plate stuck to front pastedown. Clean pages and illustrations with light tanning and mild foxing throughout. More pronounced to free endpapers and pastedowns. Binding remains firm. Boards have moderate edge-wear with bumping to corners and rubbing to surfaces. Gilt lettering is darkened. Minor splits to spine ends and corners causing cloth to be frayed. Visible wear and liquid marks to spine and boards.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. No edition stated. Introduction by G.F. Maine. Black faux leather boards decoratively stamped in gilt on the spine and upper panel. A clean copy in tight binding without dust-jacket (as issued).

Condition: Good. 1963. Reprinted. 660 pages. No dust jacket. Blue cloth. Pages are lightly tanned and foxed throughout. Light water staining to edges of pages. Slight cracking to front hinge. Binding is slightly shaky. Boards have mild edge wear with slight rubbing to surfaces. Soft crushing to spine ends with small splits. Light tanning to spine and edges. Light marking to front board, with water stained marking to rear board. Book is slightly bowed and forward leaning.

Condition: Good. 1967. Reissued. 506 pages. Paperback book with pictorial cover. Pages and binding are presentable with no major defects. Minor issues present such as mild cracking, inscriptions, inserts, light foxing, tanning and thumb marking. Overall a good condition item. Paper cover has mild edge-wear with light rubbing and creasing. Some light marking and sunning.

Condition: Good. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has hardback covers. In good all round condition. No dust jacket. undated [ca1968] Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,550grams, ISBN:

Hard Cover. Condition: Good. No Jacket. 506pp, the edges browning with age. Yellow boards with impressed design, missing the top and bottom of the spine cover. Previous owner's name on inner board, otherwise internally clean. Good 'reading copy'.

Condition: Fair. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has soft covers. In fair condition, suitable as a study copy. Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,400grams, ISBN:086819137X.

Red cloth with gilt detail; spine very faded, rubbed at head and foot. Missing front free end paper; some foxing on early pages; pages rather brittle with age, causing some splits and chipping in the margin. Name inked on verso of preface page; binding a little loose. Used - Acceptable. Fair hardback in red cloth.
